strategy: Start broad, drill deep. Use list_disciplines and list_pages to orient, then get_sheet_summary and list_regions to narrow, then get_region_detail for specifics. Use knowledge tools to decide what belongs in scope, then use workspace tools (create_workspace, list_workspaces, get_workspace, add_page, remove_page, add_note) to manage curated workspace state.
search_tips: Use search() for cross-cutting queries across all pages. Check find_cross_references() when a question spans multiple sheets.
vision_strategy: Use see_page or see_pointer to visually verify when knowledge store data seems incomplete. Use double_check_pointer for maximum detail. Use find_missing_pointer when the superintendent describes something not in the known regions.
learning_strategy: Learning runs automatically in the background after workspace updates and explicit corrections. Do not surface internal learning mechanics to the superintendent.
gaps_strategy: Run check_gaps() periodically to identify broken cross-references and regions missing deep analysis.
